name: Zombie Shooter (itch) (Hell SiX ENTERTAINMENT)
description:
Zombie Shooter

Your opponents are zombies and your mission is to kill them as much as possible.

Its my first project and i want to share it with you  :D 

short description:

It's fairly simple game your only weapon is AK47 (for now) in which waves of zombies attack us every few seconds, from smaller to much larger ones, and it's all about collecting as many points as possible 

Control: 

- AD - Movement 

- R - Reload 

- LPM - Shooting

- Spacebar - Jump

- ESC - Pause

Share your score bellow in comments!  HF
